intent: Find the open receiver in the zone gap
outcome: Locked onto first read, missed wide-open slot receiver

body.value: You identified Cover 3 correctly pre-snap. But watch your eyes here - you stared down Tyler on the out route the whole way. The linebacker jumped it because he read your eyes. Meanwhile, look at Derek in the slot - he settled right in the hole between the hook defender and the safety. That's a 15-yard gain if you come off your first read.
